history.title: River Cree Resort & Casino
items: Jackpots up to $2,500 for Royal Flush.
history.description2: River Cree Resort & Casino is a modern entertainment destination combining gaming, comfortable accommodations, and diverse dining options. Guests can enjoy a vibrant casino atmosphere with numerous slot machines and table games, as well as try their luck in poker. The resort features stylish rooms, restaurants offering various cuisines, and bars for relaxation. For fans of live shows and concerts, there is a spacious event venue. It’s an ideal spot for those seeking a mix of gaming, leisure, and entertainment in one location.

customHtml.title: A World of Gaming and Entertainment
customHtml.description:
River Cree Resort & Casino is a modern destination that combines thrilling gaming, comfortable accommodations, and a wide range of leisure options. The casino offers an atmosphere of excitement and luxury, where guests can enjoy slot machines, classic table games, and a spacious poker room. For those seeking an exclusive experience, a VIP area provides premium gaming and personalized service.


The resort features stylish bars and restaurants serving diverse cuisines and signature cocktails. Guests can choose a cozy family restaurant, a lively sports bar with live game broadcasts, or a relaxing lounge for unwinding. Every corner of the resort is designed to create unforgettable moments and a festive atmosphere.


River Cree’s hotel offers contemporary rooms with elegant design, a swimming pool, a fitness center, and all amenities for a comfortable stay. It’s an ideal choice for both short getaways and extended vacations. Spacious halls and conference facilities make it perfect for business meetings, banquets, and special events.


Entertainment at the resort includes concerts, live shows, and sports activities. The Venue hosts performances by renowned artists, while Twin Rinks attracts hockey enthusiasts. There’s always something happening — from gaming excitement to cultural experiences.


Loyalty programs and bonus offers are available for returning guests, providing exclusive benefits, discounts, and special deals. This makes a stay at River Cree not only enjoyable but also rewarding, ensuring guests keep coming back for more.


Rules for Visiting River Cree Resort & Casino

Visiting River Cree Resort & Casino requires following certain guidelines to ensure comfort and safety for all guests. The casino is designed for adult visitors, so age restrictions and dress requirements are essential. The administration aims to maintain an atmosphere of style and respect, making dress code and entry conditions important.


Main Rules and Conditions

  • • Entry is allowed only for guests 18+ with valid ID.
  • • Weapons, illegal substances, and outside beverages are prohibited.
  • • Photography and video recording in gaming areas are restricted.

Dress Code

  • • Neat, clean attire in casual or smart casual style is recommended.
  • • Beachwear, torn clothing, sports uniforms, and overly revealing outfits are not permitted.
  • • Shoes must be closed and clean.

Visiting Conditions

  • • Guests must follow responsible gaming practices.
  • • The administration reserves the right to deny entry for inappropriate behavior.
  • • Registration in the loyalty program is required for bonus offers.

Players Club Loyalty Program — Your Exclusive Benefits at River Cree

The River Cree Resort & Casino loyalty program, called Players Club, is designed to make every visit rewarding and enjoyable. Membership is completely free and registration takes just minutes. Members gain access to exclusive offers, discounts, and bonuses across all areas of the resort — from gaming to dining and accommodations. The system is based on earning points through play and purchases, which can be redeemed for River Cree Bucks and used toward services. The more you play, the higher your tier and the greater your benefits, including personalized offers and VIP events. The program features four tiers, each unlocking new privileges and bonuses.


Program Benefits

  • • Free membership and instant registration.
  • • 15% discount on hotel stays.
  • • 10% discount at restaurants and gift shops (excluding Cha Xpress and Fatburger).
  • • Access to VIP dinners, tournaments, and events.
  • • Priority ticket access for concerts and shows.
  • • Monthly giveaways, promotions, and special draws.
  • • Birthday bonus: slot free play from $5 to $500.

Points and Redemption

  • • Every 2,000 points equals $1 River Cree Bucks.
  • • Points earned through slots, table games, dining, and hotel stays.
  • • Extra points for jackpots and special member days.

Players Club Tiers

  • • Platinum — entry-level for all members.
  • • Gold — enhanced bonuses and exclusive offers.
  • • Diamond — personalized perks and VIP service.
  • • Elite — top-tier privileges, including private event invitations.

customHtml_2.title: Entertainment and Gaming at River Cree Resort & Casino
customHtml_2.description:
River Cree Bonuses and Special Offers

River Cree Resort & Casino offers guests not only thrilling games but also a wide range of bonuses, promotions, and seasonal events that make every visit exciting and rewarding. Regular poker tournaments, special table game offers, and unique promotions with big cash prizes keep the energy high. The casino hosts themed events, holiday giveaways, and dining specials that complement the vibrant atmosphere. Monthly jackpots for poker players and free bet options on popular games add extra chances to win. Seasonal entertainment includes concerts, live shows, and sports events, turning your stay into an unforgettable experience.


Bonuses and Offers

  • • Poker Tournaments: Monday Madness — weekly on Mondays, buy-in $75, prize pool based on entries. Deep Stack Tournament — twice a month, buy-in $315, starting stack 25,000 chips.
  • • Table Game Promotions: Free Bet Blackjack — double down or split for free. Minimum bet $15, maximum $400. Side bet Pot of Gold pays up to $25.
  • • Jackpots and Cash Prizes: High Hand Jackpots — monthly prizes for top poker hands: Straight Flush — $1,000; Royal Flush — $2,500; Progressive Jackpot — grows to tens of thousands.
  • • Seasonal Events: Concerts and shows at The Venue, sports events at Twin Rinks, holiday promotions with cash and gift giveaways.
  • • Dining Specials: Tap 25 — Happy Hour drinks for $5.25, up to 50% off menu items on select days.

Popular Games at River Cree Resort & Casino

River Cree Resort & Casino offers a wide range of exciting games for both casual players and seasoned enthusiasts. The gaming floor features modern slot machines with diverse themes and features, including progressive jackpots. Fans of table games can enjoy classics like blackjack, roulette, baccarat, and popular poker variants such as Ultimate Texas Hold’em and Three Card Poker. For high-stakes players, the High Limit area and the VIP Embers section provide premium gaming experiences. The poker room, equipped with 12 tables, hosts cash games and regular tournaments, creating a competitive and lively atmosphere. Open 24/7, the casino ensures endless entertainment for every type of player.


Popular Games

  • • Slots: classic, video slots, progressive jackpots.
  • • Table Games: blackjack, roulette, baccarat, craps.
  • • Poker: Ultimate Texas Hold’em, Three Card Poker, Pai Gow.
  • • High Limit Games: blackjack and baccarat for high rollers.
  • • Poker Room: 12 tables, tournaments, and cash games.

Minimum and Maximum Bets at River Cree Resort & Casino

River Cree Resort & Casino offers a wide range of betting limits suitable for both beginners and high rollers. Slot machines start with very low minimum bets, while high-limit areas cater to players seeking bigger thrills. Table games also provide flexible options, from accessible stakes for casual players to elevated limits in VIP sections. This diversity ensures an enjoyable experience for every type of guest.


Game Type Minimum Bet Maximum Bet
Slots $0.01 $25
Roulette $5 $500
Blackjack $5 $400
Baccarat $10 $500
Poker (Cash) $1 No Limit

High-limit Embers area offers up to $25 slots and elevated table game limits.


Entertainment and Events at River Cree Resort & Casino

River Cree Resort & Casino is not just about gaming — it’s a hub for vibrant entertainment and unforgettable experiences. The main stage for concerts and shows is The Venue, one of the top event spaces in the Greater Edmonton area. It hosts world-class concerts, tribute acts, theatrical performances, and comedy nights. With a capacity ranging from 500 to 2,500 guests, The Venue offers an intimate yet dynamic atmosphere for any event.


Regular entertainment includes live music, themed parties, and sports broadcasts in the bars. Nightlife is a major highlight: guests can enjoy the lively Centre Bar at the heart of the casino or relax at Tap 25 Sports Bar, featuring big-screen hockey games and casual dining. Dance parties and DJ nights are frequently organized, creating an energetic vibe for those who love club-style fun.


Special events range from Thunder from Down Under to holiday celebrations and exclusive shows. The event calendar features rock concerts, pop performances, comedy acts, and even circus productions like Cirque Musica Holiday Wonderland, making River Cree the ultimate destination for diverse entertainment.


Entertainment Highlights

  • • The Venue — premier stage for concerts, shows, and comedy nights.
  • • Centre Bar — stylish casino bar with live music.
  • • Tap 25 Sports Bar — sports bar with game broadcasts and snacks.
  • • Live Concerts — performances by top artists and tribute bands (U2, April Wine, ZZ Top).
  • • Comedy Nights — stand-up shows and humorous acts.
  • • Themed Parties — Halloween Howler, New Year’s Eve celebrations, club nights.
  • • Circus Shows — Cirque Musica and holiday productions.

Dining, Relaxation & Comfort at River Cree Resort & Casino

River Cree Resort & Casino is more than just a casino — it’s a full-scale resort where every guest can find their ideal way to unwind. The casino offers a modern gaming experience with a wide selection of slot machines, table games, and a dedicated poker room, along with the VIP Embers area for premium and private play. The heart of the resort is not only about gaming but also about relaxation, socializing, and enjoying life.


The property features several restaurants and bars, each with its own unique vibe and menu. The hotel offers 249 stylish rooms, a pool, fitness center, and facilities for both business and celebratory events. Guests can enjoy live music, shows, hockey games at the twin ice rinks, or simply a cozy evening by the fireplace with a cup of coffee. River Cree is the perfect destination for entertainment, leisure, and memorable experiences.


Dining & Lounge Options

  • • The Kitchen Restaurant – family-friendly Western cuisine.
  • • Tap 25 Sports Bar – sports broadcasts and hearty meals.
  • • Cha Xpress – Cantonese dishes, dim sum, noodles, BBQ.
  • • Fatburger – classic burgers, fries, and shakes.
  • • Cree Subs – sandwiches, hot dogs, and taco bowls.
  • • Lobby Coffee Bar – Starbucks coffee, snacks, and pastries.
  • • Onyx Lounge – cocktails and light bites in Embers.
  • • Centre Bar – stylish 360° bar at the casino’s center.

items.title: How do I register for the Players Club?
items.answer: Visit the Players Club desk with valid photo ID. Registration is free and quick.

items.title: Is there a birthday bonus?
items.answer: Yes, slot free play from $5 to $500 during your birthday month.

items.title: What payment methods are accepted?
items.answer: Cash, credit/debit cards, e-wallets — depending on the platform.

items.title: Can I pay with River Cree Bucks?
items.answer: Yes, they’re accepted at restaurants, hotel, and gift shop.

items.title: How do I reach VIP status?
items.answer: Earn enough points within a 12-month period.
